title: Motorola razr | 2023 | Unlocked | Made for US 8/128 | 32MP Camera | Cherry Blossom, 73.95 x 170.82 x 7.35mm
description: Meet the all-new motorola razr with a super stylish, pocket-friendly flip design. Available in a range of fun, trendsetting colors and a vegan leather finish, motorola razr reimagines what a phone can do. Discover new ways to interact, capture, and create by folding your phone so it stands on its own at multiple angles. Go all day and night on a single charge of its outstanding battery. View notifications on an external display with the phone closed, so you’re always up to date. Then flip it open to reveal an ultra-smooth, incredibly vivid 6.9" pOLED screen combined with multidimensional sound for immersive entertainment. Add to that its 64MP and 32MP high-res cameras, and you’ve got a phone like no other. Embrace the unexpected with the new motorola razr.
